name: Upside Down (itch) (QuarkTasche)
description:
Description

You wake up in a cave and you can't remember anything. On your way to find an exit you meet a little soul that has the ability to change gravity. Together you make your way through the cave to find an exit.

(You can't Jump! Only Change Gravity

Controls

A - D  (Keyboard) or left joystick to move

W - S   (Keyboard) or up and down to look up or down

Space   (Keyboard)  or  A (On Controller) to change gravity

G    (Keyboard) or  B  (On Controller) to grab a box

E     (Keyboard) or  X (On Controller) to enter a door

Credits

Timon - Helping me out in Unity

Tronik - Helping me out in Unity

Lukas - Helping me out in Unity

Ben - Helping me out in Unity

Lava - Game character

Chaos - Game character

Darwin - Game character


Music
by
Epidemicsound
